channel.title: Adding lime whip error[HELP]
channel.description:
[b]I have followed multiple tutorials on how to add Lime Whip to server.. But I guess I'm retarded because I can't seem to get it right. First, I made a model of lime from the original whip, saved it, made it .gz put it in models.[/b] [img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/moparscape/images/8/8a/Screen_Shot_2014-01-20_at_1.09.11_PM.png[/img]
[b]Next I added the information into class8.java[/b] [img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/moparscape/images/4/49/Screen_Shot_2014-01-20_at_1.10.34_PM.png[/img]
[b]Next, I went onto my server, and added the models.[/b] [img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/moparscape/images/1/11/Screen_Shot_2014-01-20_at_1.11.48_PM.png[/img]
[b]Then I tried to spawn it...[/b] [img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/moparscape/images/8/87/Screen_Shot_2014-01-20_at_1.18.25_PM.png[/img]
[b]Then, I either get booted off the server right away, or I get a null item, then booted. Any suggestions?[/b]

item.title: Adding lime whip error[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

thefallen1:

alright i’ll change it to like 30000, but how do I get client to preload models?

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/models/170740-every-crossbow-bolt-dragon-arrows-2.html#post1483853
I believe that will help.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding lime whip error[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make your client preload models, loading models that way is horrible lol.
Also, you might want to use a different model id as 13000 is a low number, and something else (ex: an object) could already be using that id.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding lime whip error[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @thefallen1 thefallen1
item.description:
@thefallen1 wrote:

I have followed multiple tutorials on how to add Lime Whip to server… But I guess I’m retarded because I can’t seem to get it right. First, I made a model of lime from the original whip, saved it, made it .gz put it in models.

Next I added the information into class8.java

Next, I went onto my server, and added the models.

Then I tried to spawn it…

Then, I either get booted off the server right away, or I get a null item, then booted. Any suggestions?

Read full topic
